alert.note: Alert for La Crosse; Monroe; Richland; Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 3:41PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact southeastern La Crosse, central Vernon, northwestern Richland and southwestern Monroe Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 339 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bangor to Cashton to near Viroqua. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph, half inch hail, and torrential rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Heavy rainfall could cause quick rises in streams and ditches. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Sparta and Cashton around 345 PM CDT. La Farge around 350 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Wildcat Mountain State Park, County Roads G And H, Jersey Valley County Park, Rockland, Newburg Corners, Highway 82 And County A, Barre Mills, Melvina, County Roads D And P, and Highway 82 And County D. This includes Interstate 90 in Wisconsin between mile markers 8 and 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
